This is an awesome game. Its such a classic and its very enjoyable. I first got the game when I was seven on my Xbox 360 and had a hard time with it. Eventually I Picked it up three or four years later and ever since then I have completed the game seven times. I've played it on my Xbox 360, Xbox One, and my computer. Portal 2 is a timeless classic and I recommend it it to anybody with an IQ over 17.

I highly recommend you play Portal 2. This game is definitely a step up from the first Portal game (which I also recommend). Portal 2 is a lot longer and has a richer story than the first one. The puzzles are also more impressive with more mind boggling challenges. Several new puzzle mechanics are introduced in this game which enhances the overall game play. So overall, I highly recommend this game and wish they would make a 3rd Portal game!
